articles.title: Scientists Create ‘Woolly Mice’ in Major Step Toward Woolly Mammoth Revival - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: Scientists at Colossal Biosciences have genetically engineered woolly mice with mammoth-like fur, marking a major step toward woolly mammoth de-extinction.
articles.content: A biotechnology breakthrough has brought the world one step closer to reviving the woolly mammoth, as scientists have successfully created genetically modified woolly mice with thick, mammoth-like fu… [+6211 chars]
